WorkItem.Description:
Description:
4 items are giving ridiculous values in the Gear -> All section due to insane ability multipliers on them
 
Steps to Reproduce:
Import Onibubble, Emerald Dream. Then select Gear -> All (This is slow to calc) on the right pane.
 
Version Number/Additional Information:
Browser version 4.1.1.0
 
Details:
The following items show up as extremely powerful and therefore destroy the scale of how good other items actually are. The cause appears to be due to very high Judgement/Crusader Strike damage modifiers being applied to these items. See attached SS.
[Tyrande's Favorite Doll], [Shadowmourne], [Bryntroll, the Bone Arbiter] (both normal and heroic versions)

Comments.Message: For now, just edit those items and fix them manually. We'll update the cache for next version.
